meanings.definition: Relating to the study of the moon.
meanings.sent1: The selenological research team discovered new craters on the moon.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use selenological tools to analyze lunar samples.
meanings.sent3: The selenological conference had a moon-themed costume party.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a selenological map, filled with lunar mysteries.
meanings.sent5: The selenological images captured by the telescope were breathtaking.

meanings.definition: A person who studies the moon.
meanings.sent1: The selenological presented their findings at the astronomy conference.
meanings.sent2: As a selenological, she spent nights observing the moon through her telescope.
meanings.sent3: The selenological joked that they were over the moon about their research.
meanings.sent4: He was a selenological, always reaching for the stars and beyond.
meanings.sent5: The young selenological dreamed of walking on the moon one day.

meanings.definition: The scientific study of the moon.
meanings.sent1: Selenological involves analyzing lunar rocks and soil samples.
meanings.sent2: Many universities offer courses in selenological.
meanings.sent3: The selenological department received a grant for their moon research.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for selenological was evident in her detailed moon models.
meanings.sent5: The selenological field is constantly evolving with new discoveries.
